name: Last Memories (RzeL)
description:
Last Memories

Warning : Death Theme, It's Better If The Reader Age Is 13+.

Enjoy Short Stories About Couples That Talking When The World Is Almost Ending. What They Talking About ?. Why Don't You Check It Out ?. :)

And Made In Tweego (Twine Compiler). On Android.
